attributes.action: We need to selectively support the EU but not fund nor be part of  the EU army
attributes.additional_details:
Being tied to the EU in any way is wrong on many levels

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=66uCnNwLJtM
attributes.background:
We have our own army any funding should go to that 

We do not want to be committed to any conflict we choose not to be part of 
We do not want anyone but Great Britain training our troops
